summary: Follow distance fixed, talking constantly fixed.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/17926]Link to Special Edition version[/url][/size]

[i]"Forsworn think they're so scary... Cicero will show you who's scary! ..Stupid Forsworn..."[/i]

Cicero will level up with the player. (Maximum level 70)
He uses perks and can duel wield.

Minimum follow distance raised, he won't get so close now.(Or push you off a cliff)

He won't talk constantly now. (There is a version where he will talk as often as he does in the vanilla game)

He won't stand around and do nothing when idling.

He'll use combat dialogue he should have been using.
 
 

[size=4][center]Compatibility[/center][/size][center]Will conflict with anything that changes Cicero[/center]


[size=4][center]Requirements[/center][/size][center]The only thing required is the latest Skyrim Update.[/center]
author: Reath

files.name: Better Cicero
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed conflict with DB quest
Added vanilla talking version

files.name: Better Cicero Vanilla Talking
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed conflict with DB quest
Added vanilla talking version
